xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 3 Vedanāttika » 3.7 Pañhāvāra » 3.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 3.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Sahajāta
Vedanāttika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Sahajāta
49.
1912Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo—  sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (1)
50.
1913Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo—  dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttapaṭisandhi na labbhati.) (1)
51.
1914Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo—  adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (1)
